name: Janitor Chronicles
description:
Ready to clean the bad vibes away? 

You are a janitor that starts his shift at night in a haunted school, you need to clean all the dirty spots and escape before the timer runs out.  But beware, a ghost might be lurking around to hold you back and prevent you from finishing!

Features:

  • Awesome cleaning action! 
    • Spots of ectoplasms are scattered through all the school, clean as much as you can!
  • Ghosts appear out of nowhere! 
    • Ghosts appear after a certain time, every time one touches you, your score lowers! 
  • Clean the desired amount to finish your shift!
    • You need to clean at least 30 spots so the main entrance opens for you to finish the game. 

Controls:

  • WASD to move the player.
  • Mouse to look around 
  • Spacebar to clean the big spots

Credits: FO Team
